resources.string:
This application is used for maintaining a list of products and their warranty expiry date. 
 
Features of the application: 
Add a new product and its expiry date 
Let user update a product and its expiry date 
Let user delete a product 
Application will show products and its warranty expiry date
Type in the product name here
Type in the year you are checking for
Type in the month you are checking for
Type in the index of the product to be removed
Type in the product you want to update
Type in the warranty expiring date
Type in the new warranty expiring date
Type in the new product name here
